amendment.description: Amendment requires that the Secretary, or any other Federal official proposing a rule under this Act, shall publish with each rule proposed under this Act, each scientific study the Secretary or other official, respectively, relied on in developing the rule in order to ensure that rules being issued are based on scientific study.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-680 to require that the Secretary, or any other Federal official proposing a rule under this Act, shall publish with each rule proposed under this Act each, scientific study the Secretary or other official, respectively, relied on in developing the rule. This amendment ensures that rules being issued are based on scientific study.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bucshon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
